hospital_name: Dr. Surya Kant Jha | Eye Doctor | Eye Specialist | Eye Surgeon

reviews.author: Km Vandana
reviews.text:
I recently got my mother's cataract surgery done  by Dr Surya Kant jha and I'm very satisfied with the entire process. Dr jha is highly skilled and explained the process in detail, which made us feel comfortable and confident..the surgery went smoothly and my mother's vision has improved significantly. The staff was also professional and helpful throughout specially Mr. Adil.
I highly recommend Dr Surya Kant jha for anyone in need of expert eye care
Thankyou

reviews.author: Radhey shyam Bansiwal
reviews.text: Had a wonderful experience with Dr. Surya Kant Jha .I can't thank you enough for the special , excellent care you have provided . Thank you for the great care and surgery you performed on me . And also thanks to all the staff who was really helpful during the procedure.
